text: Claude Beaufort Moss (1888–1964) was a Church of England theologian, ecumenist, and author. He served as a member of the Archbishop of Canterbury's Council on Foreign Relations from 1933 until his death. == Bibliography == *The Christian Faith: An Introduction to Dogmatic Theology (London: SPCK, 1944) *The Old Catholic Movement: Its Origins and History (London: SPCK, 1948). *The Church of England and the Seventh Council (London: Faith Press, 1957) *Answer Me This (New York: Longmans, Green, 1959) == External links == *Bibliographic directory from Project Canterbury Category:1888 births Category:1964 deaths
